name: Dinogen Arena
description:
DINOGEN ARENA

Official Game Page | Official Game Guide

Dinogen Arena is a top-down arena shooter based off my original game Dinogen.

CONTROLS

All controls can be changed in the settings menu.

KEYACTIONMouseFire weapon/attackWASD or arrow keysMovementQ or number keysSwitch weaponRReloadEInteractSPACEMelee attackSHIFTSprintTABView scoreboard

TUTORIAL

Learn the fundamentals of Dinogen Arena by completing the tutorial. Strongly recommended for new players!

RANKED MODE

Progress through the ranks by earning XP in game by killing enemies, completing challenges, and finishing objectives. Unlock new weapons, equipment, and perks as you level up!

  • Select a game mode and modify the game settings to your liking
  • Melee kills, killstreaks, and mulit-kills earn you bonus XP
  • Enemies become more skilled as you level up
  • Some game modes allow you to play as a dinosaur
  • Try different game modes and maps!

SURVIVAL MODE

Enjoy endless carnage? Hold out as long as you can against the endless waves of increasingly difficult dinosaurs.

  • Purchase new weapons from the armory
  • Call in soldiers and air support from the armory
  • Buy and upgrade auto turrets to fortify your position
  • You earn money from your allies' kills
  • Red savage dinosaurs drop bonus money
